sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'; import { Link, useNavigate } from 'react-router-dom'; import Nav from '../../components/Nav'; import { useDispatch, useSelector } from 'react-redux'; import axios from 'axios'; import { toast } from 'react-toastify'; import { removeAuthUser } from '../../redux/userSlice.js'; const Profile = () => { const navigate = useNavigate(); const dispatch = useDispatch(); const { authUser } = useSelector((state) => state.user); const username = authUser?.userName || 'Guest'; // Sample user data const user = { id: 'MathWizard42', name: 'Alex Johnson', email: 'alex.johnson@example.com', rating: 2450, rank: 15, totalGames: 127, wins: 89, solutionsSubmitted: 215, joinDate: '2023-05-15', lastActive: '2024-01-20', achievements: [ 'Fast Solver (10 problems in <1 min)', 'Perfect Streak (5 wins in a row)', 'Top 20 Player' ] }; const winPercentage = Math.round((user.wins / user.totalGames) * 100); const handleLogout = async () => { try { const res = await axios.get(`http://localhost:8080/api/users/logout`); toast.success(res.data.message); dispatch(removeAuthUser()); navigate('/'); } catch (error) { toast.error(error.response.data.message); } }; return (
{/* Profile Card */}
{use.charAt(0).toUpperCase()}

{user.name}

@{user.id}

{user.email}

Rating {user.rating}
{user.rank}
RANK
{winPercentage}%
WIN RATE

Details

Member Since {new Date(user.joinDate).toLocaleDateString()}
Last Active {new Date(user.lastActive).toLocaleDateString()}
{/* Stats Section */}

Player Statistics

Achievements

{user.achievements.map((achievement, index) => ( {achievement} ))}

Recent Activity

Edit Profile
); }; // Reusable Stat Card const StatCard = ({ title, value, icon, color }) => (
{icon}

{title}

{value}

); // Reusable Activity Item const ActivityItem = ({ title, time, icon }) => (
{icon}

{title}

{time}

); export default Profile;
